typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TEMPB as string,
		MATNR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MARA
ExpItemStorageCondition filter(!isNull(TEMPB)) ~> Filter2
MARA derive(StorageConditionId = 9999) ~> ExpItemStorageCondition
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ItemSku as string,
		StorageConditionId as integer,
		ItemStorageConditionNote as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MATNR,
		StorageConditionId,
		ItemStorageConditionNote = TEMPB
	)) ~> ItemStorageCondition
